title: Totally Scrooged
description: It'll take three ghosts and two meddling grandmothers, but Harper and Grayson just might get their Christmas happily ever after.After Harper catches Grayson kissing another woman, she swears off Christmas, determined to ignore everything about it. When her grandmother asks her to come to Petunia, Texas and help with the costumes for the annual play, she reluctantly agrees.Grayson still can't believe Harper won't let him explain. He intended to propose and now she won't speak to him. Heartbroken over Harper's unwillingness to believe in him, he heads to Petunia at his grandmother's request to help build sets for the town's annual play, A Christmas Carol.Even when Harper sees Grayson, she still won't talk to him.Can a ghost from the past, present, and future help Harper give Grayson a second chance? Or will she allow bitterness to send her down a path away from the greatest love of her life?
author: Carly Morgan
